name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#夏色FullBloom ⧸ 夏色まつり誕生ライブ【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [pKc5qSSWJQs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening introduction sequence with various clips and background music.
Fireworks display and audience cheering leading into the first performance.
Performance of 'Kimi to Nagameru Natsu no Hana' by Natsuiro Matsuri.
scenes.song_name: Kimi to Nagameru Natsu no Hana

subtitles.original: もっと もっと 上がるよ 空に
subtitles.english: Rising higher and higher into the sky,
are the giant flowers of summer.
The Summer Flower I Watch with You

subtitles.original: 作詞：芳賀峻　作曲・編曲：メリッサ
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Shun Haga / Composition & Arrangement: Melissa

subtitles.original: Music：メリッサ　Movie：あきまゆ
ふらふら歩く夜の　美味しい香りに誘われて
subtitles.english: Drawn by the delicious scents of the night as I wander,

subtitles.original: カラコロ響く下駄の音　どこまでも
subtitles.english: the clatter of my clogs echoes on and on.

subtitles.original: キラキラ輝く屋台の明かりに飛び込んで
subtitles.english: Diving into the light of the sparkling festival stalls,

subtitles.original: パクパク頬張る真っ赤なイチゴ飴
subtitles.english: I gobble down a bright red strawberry candy.

subtitles.original: さぁ　パッと　パッと
ほらね　今年も花火が打ち上がる
subtitles.english: Look, the fireworks are going off again this year.

subtitles.original: さぁ　祭りだ　祭りだ　祭りだ　ワッショイ！
subtitles.english: Now, it's a festival! A festival! A festival! Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: 一　二　の　三　ので声出して
subtitles.english: On the count of one, two, three, let's shout!

subtitles.original: 手と手を繋いで　さぁ行こう
